member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.DigitalId
member.summary: The ID of the digital comic representation of this comic. Will be 0 if the comic is not available digitally.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.Title
member.summary: The canonical title of the comic.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.IssueNumber
member.summary: The number of the issue in the series (will generally be 0 for collection formats).

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.VariantDescription
member.summary: If the issue is a variant (e.g. an alternate cover, second printing, or directorâ€™s cut), a text description of the variant.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.Description
member.summary: The preferred description of the comic.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.Isbn
member.summary: The ISBN for the comic (generally only populated for collection formats).

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.Upc
member.summary: The UPC barcode number for the comic (generally only populated for periodical formats).

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.DiamondCode
member.summary: The Diamond code for the comic.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.Ean
member.summary: The EAN barcode for the comic.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.Issn
member.summary: The ISSN barcode for the comic.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.Format
member.summary: The publication format of the comic e.g. comic, hardcover, trade paperback.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.PageCount
member.summary: The number of story pages in the comic.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.TextObjects
member.summary: A set of descriptive text blurbs for the comic.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.Urls
member.summary: A set of public web site URLs for the resource.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.Series
member.summary: A summary representation of the series to which this comic belongs.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.Variants
member.summary: A list of variant issues for this comic (includes the "original" issue if the current issue is a variant).

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.Collections
member.summary: A list of collections which include this comic (will generally be empty if the comic's format is a collection).

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.CollectedIssues
member.summary: A list of issues collected in this comic (will generally be empty for periodical formats such as "comic" or "magazine").

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.Dates
member.summary: A list of key dates for this comic.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.Prices
member.summary: A list of prices for this comic.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.Images
member.summary: A list of promotional images associated with this comic.

member.summary: A resource list containing the creators associated with this comic.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.Characters
member.summary: A resource list containing the characters which appear in this comic.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.Stories
member.summary: A resource list containing the stories which appear in this comic.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Comic.Events
member.summary: A resource list containing the events in which this comic appears.

member.summary: A class representing the full response from the Marvel Comics API

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Response`1.Success
member.summary: If false, the Marvel Comics API did not return an error code.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Response`1.Code
member.summary: The status code of the returned result.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Response`1.Status
member.summary: A string description of the call status.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Response`1.Copyright
member.summary: The copyright notice for the returned result.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Response`1.AttributionText
member.summary: The attribution notice for this result. Please display either this notice or the contents of the attributionHTML field on all screens which contain data from the Marvel Comics API.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Response`1.AttributionHtml
member.summary: An HTML representation of the attribution notice for this result. Please display either this notice or the contents of the attributionText field on all screens which contain data from the Marvel Comics API.

member.summary: The results returned by the call.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Model.Response`1.ETag
member.summary: A digest value of the content returned by the call.

member.name: T:MarvelSharp.Criteria.StoryCriteria
member.summary: A class representing criteria by which to filter stories.

member.summary: Initializes an instance of the StoryCriteria class

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.StoryCriteria.Characters
member.summary: Return only stories which feature characters specified by a list of IDs.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.StoryCriteria.Comics
member.summary: Return only stories contained in comics specified by a list of IDs.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.StoryCriteria.Creators
member.summary: Return only stories which feature work by creators specified by a list of IDs.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.StoryCriteria.Events
member.summary: Return only stories which take place during events specified by a list of IDs.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.StoryCriteria.Series
member.summary: Return only stories contained in series speified by a list of IDs.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.StoryCriteria.OrderBy
member.summary: Order the result set by the selected fields. Multiple values are given priority in the order in which they are passed.

member.name: T:MarvelSharp.Criteria.SeriesCriteria
member.summary: A class representing criteria by which to filter series.

member.summary: Initializes an instance of the SeriesCriteria class

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.SeriesCriteria.Title
member.summary: Return only series matching the specified title.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.SeriesCriteria.TitleStartsWith
member.summary: Return series with titles that begin with the specified string (e.g. Sp).

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.SeriesCriteria.StartYear
member.summary: Return only series matching the specified start year.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.SeriesCriteria.Characters
member.summary: Return only series which feature characters specified by a list of IDs.

member.summary: Return only series which contain comics specified by a list of IDs.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.SeriesCriteria.Creators
member.summary: Return only series which feature work by creators specified by a list of IDs.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.SeriesCriteria.Events
member.summary: Return only series which have comics that take place during events specified by a list of IDs.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.SeriesCriteria.Stories
member.summary: Return only series which contain stories specified by a list of IDs.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.SeriesCriteria.SeriesType
member.summary: Filter the series by publication frequency type.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.SeriesCriteria.Contains
member.summary: Return only series containing one or more comics with the specified format(s).

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.SeriesCriteria.OrderBy
member.summary: Order the result set by the selected fields. Multiple values are given priority in the order in which they are passed.

member.summary: Exclude variants (alternate covers, secondary printings, director's cuts, etc.) from the result set.

member.summary: Return comics within a predefined date range.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.ComicCriteria.DateRange
member.summary: Return comics within a predefined date range.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.ComicCriteria.HasDigitalIssue
member.summary: Include only results which are available digitally.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.ComicCriteria.Creators
member.summary: Return only comics which feature work by creators specified by a list of IDs.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.ComicCriteria.Series
member.summary: Return only comics which are part of series specified by a list of IDs.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.ComicCriteria.Events
member.summary: Return only comics which take place in events specified by a list of IDs.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.ComicCriteria.Stories
member.summary: Return only comics which contain stories specified by a list of IDs.

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.ComicCriteria.SharedAppearances
member.summary: Return only comics in which characters specified by a list of IDs appear together (for example in which BOTH Spider-Man and Wolverine appear).

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.ComicCriteria.Collaborators
member.summary: Return only comics in which creators specified by a list of IDs worked together (for example in which BOTH Stan Lee and Jack Kirby did work).

member.name: P:MarvelSharp.Criteria.ComicCriteria.OrderBy
member.summary: Order the result set by the selected fields. Multiple values are given priority in the order in which they are passed.
